short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A calculator extension with scientific functionality that uses encryption (AES) to quickly produce results in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Lightweight, no ads, no registration, free of charge
* Basic calculation features (+-*/()=)
* Scientific functionality (root, exp, log, sin, cos, tan)
* Handles key bindings, button and display typing
* Encrypts calculation data (AES)
